nodes.text: Some time during 1 ABY, Himfan traveled to a city on Tatooine with a group of fellow smugglers. Not long after, a bounty hunter named Tearfin located Himfan and his friends, suspecting him of being a thief who stole some valuable equipment.
Tearfin interrogated Himfan, and quickly determined that he was trustworthy, and not the mark she was looking for.

Himfan is a Non-Player Characters (NPC's) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. He periodically spawns in random cities across Tatooine, along with Tearfin and the five other smugglers. Players taking part in the "Hero of Tatooine" quest-line must interrogate Himfan and the other smugglers, to determine which one is Tearfin's mark.
Due to the nature of the game, Himfan's appearance fluctuates, but he is always a male.
